identity.name: E1 Minimalist
identity.core_philosophy: Bootstrap colors, but make it Art. Functional, clean, spacious.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Bootstrap colors + Swiss Grid Layouts.
Emotion First: Clarity and Calmness for productivity.
Content is King: Data and Tasks take center stage.
Negative Space: 2x standard padding to elevate the 'Minimal' aesthetic.
Contrast: High contrast text for accessibility and sharpness.

rules: Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings larger than 24px.
Use 'tracking-wide' and uppercase for small labels/captions.

usage_rules: Primary Blue (#0d6efd) is for Main Actions (Buttons, Active States) ONLY.
Backgrounds should be White (#ffffff) or Light Gray (#f8f9fa).
Text should be Dark Gray (#212529), never pure black.
Use Success/Danger colors sparingly for status indicators.

rules: Use generous padding. If you think 'p-4' is enough, use 'p-6'.
Containers with borders MUST have 'p-6' or 'p-8' internal padding.

dashboard.name: Control Room Grid
dashboard.description: Dense grid for data correlation. Widgets stretch to fill height.

topics_list.name: Tetris Grid
topics_list.description: Asymmetric grid for visual interest. Mix wide and tall cards.

cards.style: bg-white border border-[#dee2e6] rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: rounded-md border border-[#dee2e6] bg-[#f8f9fa] focus:bg-white focus:border-[#0d6efd] focus:ring-2 focus:ring-[#0d6efd]/20 transition-all

navigation.style: sticky top-0 z-50 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-[#dee2e6]

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals.

login_hero.usage: Login page side panel or hero background

assets.icons: Lucide React (default). Use simple, thin strokes.

rules: Interactive elements must have focus states (ring-2 ring-offset-2).
Use semantic HTML (main, section, article, nav).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Swiss Utility' aesthetic: Clean, White, Blue Accents.
Use the provided Bootstrap Hex codes for colors.
Do NOT use default Shadcn 'zinc' colors; override them with the Bootstrap palette in tailwind.config.js.
Use 'Manrope' for headings and 'Inter' for body.
Ensure all interactive elements have the 'data-testid' attribute.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Navigation and Sidebar.
For the Dashboard, use the 'Control Room Grid' strategy.
For the Topics List, use the 'Tetris Grid' strategy.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Do NOT use AI assistant Emoji characters.
